text: Approval to extend the product line of the SCIMED(R) Quantum Ranger(TM) PTCA Catheter to include additional balloon lengths of 9 mm, 16 mm, and 18 mm with balloon diameters ranging from 2.5 mm to 4.0 mm in 0.25 mm increments and is indicated for balloon dilatation of the stenotic portion of a coronary artery or bypass graft stenosis for the purpose of improving myocardial perfusion.
